title: Maskiss 25-Pairs 24K Gold Under Eye Patches/Masks for Puffy Eyes, Dark Circles and Puffiness, Collagen Skin Care Products
descriptions:
Meet your new under-eye essential: Maskiss 25-Pairs 24K Gold Under Eye Patches. Infused with collagen, 24K nano gold, and hyaluronic acid, these luxurious gel patches flood the delicate eye area with deep hydration while targeting puffiness, dark circles, and fine lines for a brighter, smoother, more awake look.

Why you’ll love them:
- Instant depuff and brighten: Visibly reduce bags and dark circles to look refreshed fast.
- Smooth, plump, and firm: Collagen and gold help support elasticity for a youthful, lifted appearance.
- Quench thirsty skin: Hyaluronic acid delivers lasting moisture and a dewy finish.
- Gentle for all skin types: Powered by natural plant extracts, made for daily use with no reported side effects.
- Results that compound: Consistent use supports cell rejuvenation and collagen renewal.

How to use:
- Cleanse face and eye area with warm water.
- Apply one patch under each eye and press gently to secure.
- Leave on for 20 minutes, remove, and lightly pat in the remaining essence.
- Use twice a day for a boosted routine or at least once a week for maintenance.

What’s inside:
- 25 pairs of gold-infused eye patches, perfectly portioned for a month of daily radiance or weeks of targeted touch-ups.

Treat yourself to spa-worthy, glass-skin under eyes—anytime, anywhere. Maskiss makes looking well-rested effortless.
